import{createStore,combineReducers,applyMiddleware,compose}from"redux";import profileReducer from"./profile-reducer";import dialogsReducer from"./dialogs-reducer";import UsersReducer from"./users-reducer";import authReducer from"./auth-reducer";import appReducer from'./app-reducer';import thunkMiddleware from'redux-thunk';import{reducer as formReducer}from'redux-form';var reducers=combineReducers({profilePage:profileReducer,dialogsPage:dialogsReducer,usersPage:UsersReducer,auth:authReducer,form:formReducer,app:appReducer});var composeEnhancers=window.__REDUX_DEVTOOLS_EXTENSION_COMPOSE__||compose;var store=createStore(reducers,composeEnhancers(applyMiddleware(thunkMiddleware)));//let store = createStore(reducers, applyMiddleware(thunkMiddleware));
window.store=store;export default store;
